__e: And now, let me guess, to save your wire, you're prepared to go to Judge Davis.
I told them I wouldn't do it so they made me plant a bug and said if I told you, they'd be all over us.
The best place for a bug is on something people keep with them.
Do you think he put some kind of bug in my brain or something?
I don't think a phone bug was the only thing your spy left you.
I'm just pointing out, there's no way that I can see to plant a listening device in his apartment or radio.
Does it also say that he put a bug in my room?
I found a microphone in my room."
My car was bugged, so was my office.
I'm busy. I'm sorry. I thought you'd want to know that I saw a bedbug in my room.
I killed Jack two hours ago after he wired the car.
I did, however, plant the bug in your husband's pocket that recorded everything that you said in the car.
Wait, did-- Did you bug me?
Sir, is there any chance... that someone in your office could have planted one on you?
The last time I helped you, you put a wire on me, you nearly got me killed.
